w3af-run.w3af-version: w3af - Web Application Attack and Audit Framework Version: 1.7.6 Revision: unknown Distribution: Kali Linux Rolling Branch: unknown Local changes: No Author: Andres Riancho and the w3af team.

vulnerability.name: Auto-completable form
vulnerability.description: The URL: "http://www2.mcm.edu.cn/" has a "<form>" element with auto-complete enabled.
vulnerability.long-description:
In typical form-based web applications, it is common practice for developers to allow `autocomplete` within the HTML form to improve the usability of the page. With `autocomplete` enabled (default), the browser is allowed to cache previously entered form values.
For legitimate purposes, this allows the user to quickly re-enter the same data when completing the form multiple times.
When `autocomplete` is enabled on either/both the username and password fields, this could allow a cyber-criminal with access to the victim's computer the ability to have the victim's credentials automatically entered as the cyber-criminal visits the affected page.
The tool has discovered that the affected page contains a form containing a password field that has not disabled `autocomplete`.
vulnerability.fix-guidance:
The `autocomplete` value can be configured in two different locations. The first and most secure location is to disable the `autocomplete` attribute on the `<form>` HTML tag. This will disable `autocomplete` for all inputs within that form. An example of disabling `autocomplete` within the form tag is `<form autocomplete=off>`.
The second slightly less desirable option is to disable the `autocomplete` attribute for a specific `<input>` HTML tag. While this may be the less desired solution from a security perspective, it may be preferred method for usability reasons, depending on size of the form. An example of disabling the `autocomplete` attribute within a password input tag is `<input type=password autocomplete=off>`.

http-response.body:
閸忋劌娴楁径褍\xad\xa6閻㈢喐鏆熺\x80\x9b锕\x80\xe7紦濡\xaf\xef紕鐝电挧\x9b
妫ｆ牠銆\x89 | 閺備即妞堥崗\xac\xe5鎲\xa1 | 閺圽x80\xe6鏌婃稉瀣\xad\xe6祰 | 閺佺増膩鐠佸搫娼\xa7
缁旀瑧鍋ｉ幖婊呭偍
閻\xa2\xe3劍鍩涢惂璇茬秿
閻\xa2\xe3劍鍩涢崥\x8d\t
鐎靛棛鐖\x9c\t
鐠嘰xad\xe8鈻\x88

鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳閺傝\xa7\x84纭\xb6\r

  1. 鐠囬\xa3\x8e鏁ょ挧娑樺隘缁狅紕鎮婇崨妯虹瑤閸欓\xa3\x8e娅ヨぐ鏇氫繆閹璡xaf\xe7閮寸紒鐕傜礉閼汇儰绗夐懗鑺\xa5\\xad\xa3鐢\xaf\xe5摜娅ヨぐ鏇\xaa\xe7礉鐠囩柉浠堢化\xbb缁\xaf\xe8崵绮虹粻锛勬倞閸沑x98閿沑x9b\r
  2. 閻ц\xaf\xb2缍嶉幋鎰\xac\xe5\xa7\x9b閸氬海鍋ｉ崙璇蹭箯娓氀呮畱娑揬xaa\xe4姹夊\xae\xb8銉ュ徔缁燶xb1閿涘苯褰叉穱\xae\xe6鏁兼稉\xaa\xe4姹夌挧鍕\xac\xe6灐閸滃苯鐦戦惍渚婄幢
  3. 閻愮懓鍤\xae\xe5\xae\xb8锔挎櫠閻╘x84鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe7粻锛勬倞閸楀啿褰茬粻锛勬倞鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呴妴浣瑰絹娴溿倖濮ら崥宥嗘綏閺傛瑱绱\xb0\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呯紒鐔籠xae\xa1
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9崥鍕\xaa\xe9嚋鐎涳附鐗庨惃鍕\xac\xe5Г閸氬秵鍎忛崘\xb5
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 濞ｈ\xaf\xb2濮為幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鍧婇崝鐘冲Г閸氬秳淇婇幁\xaf
      • 閵哱x82\r
    • 闁\xab\xe4礁鍙忛崶鍊熺槑闂冨懓\xae\xba閺傚洨\xae\xa1閻瀄x86: 娑撳﹥濮ら妴浣虹椽鏉堟垿\x80\x81閸忋劌娴楃拠鍕\xaf\xe6\xa7\x84閻ㄥ嫯\xae\xba閺傚洣淇婇幁\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 閼汇儴\xa6\x81閺囧瓨鏁奸張\xac\xe8绂岄崠铏规畱閹躲儱鎮曟穱鈩冧紖閿涘矁\xaf\xb7鏉╂稑鍙\x86閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閻ｅ矂娼伴敍宀\x80\xe5仯閸戣\xaf\xb2\xaf\xb9鎼存柨\xad\xa6閺嶁\x80\xb3褰告笟褏娈戦垾婊\x80\xe6叏閺\x80\xe5厜\x80\x9d閹存牑\x80\x9c閸掔娀娅庨垾婵嬫懠閹恒儻绱\xb1\r
  5. 閸婃\xa8\xbf瀚㈤幃銊ユ躬娴ｈ法鏁ゆ潻鍥┾柤娑揬xad\xe6婀侀崶浼存\xaf\xa6閸滃瞼鏋掗梻\xae\xef绱濈拠鐤\xaf\xe4粓缁痋xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn閵哱x82

濞嗐垼绻嬮弶銉ュ煂閺佺増膩缁旂偠绂岀純\x91

vulnerability.name: Non existent methods default to GET
vulnerability.description: The remote Web server has a custom configuration, in which any not implemented methods that are invoked are defaulted to GET instead of returning a "Not Implemented" response.

鍏ㄥ浗澶у\xad\xa6鐢熸暟瀛﹀缓妯＄珵璧\x9b
棣栭〉 | 鏂伴椈鍏\xac\xe5憡 | 鏈\x80\xe6柊涓嬭浇 | 鏁版ā璁哄潧

鐢ㄦ埛鐧诲綍
鐢ㄦ埛鍚\x8d\t
瀵嗙爜
璇\xad\xe8█

璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鏂规硶

  1. 璇风敤璧涘尯绠＄悊鍛樺笎鍙风櫥褰曚俊鎭\xaf\xe7郴缁燂紝鑻ヤ笉鑳芥\xad\xa3甯哥櫥褰曪紝璇疯仈绯\xbb绯荤粺绠＄悊鍛\x98锛\x9b\r
  2. 鐧诲綍鎴愬姛鍚庣偣鍑诲乏渚х殑涓\xaa\xe4汉宸ュ叿绠\xb1锛屽彲淇\xae\xe6敼涓\xaa\xe4汉璧勬枡鍜屽瘑鐮侊紱
  3. 鐐瑰嚮宸︿晶鐨\x84璧涘尯绠＄悊鍗冲彲绠＄悊璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅銆佹彁浜ゆ姤鍚嶆潗鏂欙細
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯淇℃伅锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅缁熻\xae\xa1
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鍚勪釜瀛︽牎鐨勬姤鍚嶆儏鍐\xb5
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 娣诲姞鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛氭坊鍔犳姤鍚嶄俊鎭\xaf
      • 銆\x82\r
    • 閫佸叏鍥借瘎闃呰\xae\xba鏂囩\xae\xa1鐞\x86: 涓婃姤銆佺紪杈戦\x80\x81鍏ㄥ浗璇勯槄鐨勮\xae\xba鏂囦俊鎭\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 鑻ヨ\xa6\x81鏇存敼鏈\xac\xe8禌鍖虹殑鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛岃\xaf\xb7杩涘叆鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌鐣岄潰锛岀偣鍑诲\xaf\xb9搴斿\xad\xa6鏍″彸渚х殑鈥滀慨鏀光\x80\x9d鎴栤\x80\x9c鍒犻櫎鈥濋摼鎺ワ紱
  5. 鍊樿嫢鎮ㄥ湪浣跨敤杩囩▼涓\xad\xe6湁鍥伴毦鍜岀枒闂\xae\xef紝璇疯仈绯\xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn銆\x82

鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳閺傝\xa7\x84纭\xb6\r

  1. 鐠囬\xa3\x8e鏁ょ挧娑樺隘缁狅紕鎮婇崨妯虹瑤閸欓\xa3\x8e娅ヨぐ鏇氫繆閹璡xaf\xe7閮寸紒鐕傜礉閼汇儰绗夐懗鑺\xa5\\xad\xa3鐢\xaf\xe5摜娅ヨぐ鏇\xaa\xe7礉鐠囩柉浠堢化\xbb缁\xaf\xe8崵绮虹粻锛勬倞閸沑x98閿沑x9b\r
  2. 閻ц\xaf\xb2缍嶉幋鎰\xac\xe5\xa7\x9b閸氬海鍋ｉ崙璇蹭箯娓氀呮畱娑揬xaa\xe4姹夊\xae\xb8銉ュ徔缁燶xb1閿涘苯褰叉穱\xae\xe6鏁兼稉\xaa\xe4姹夌挧鍕\xac\xe6灐閸滃苯鐦戦惍渚婄幢
  3. 閻愮懓鍤\xae\xe5\xae\xb8锔挎櫠閻╘x84鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe7粻锛勬倞閸楀啿褰茬粻锛勬倞鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呴妴浣瑰絹娴溿倖濮ら崥宥嗘綏閺傛瑱绱\xb0\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呯紒鐔籠xae\xa1
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9崥鍕\xaa\xe9嚋鐎涳附鐗庨惃鍕\xac\xe5Г閸氬秵鍎忛崘\xb5
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 濞ｈ\xaf\xb2濮為幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鍧婇崝鐘冲Г閸氬秳淇婇幁\xaf
      • 閵哱x82\r
    • 闁\xab\xe4礁鍙忛崶鍊熺槑闂冨懓\xae\xba閺傚洨\xae\xa1閻瀄x86: 娑撳﹥濮ら妴浣虹椽鏉堟垿\x80\x81閸忋劌娴楃拠鍕\xaf\xe6\xa7\x84閻ㄥ嫯\xae\xba閺傚洣淇婇幁\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 閼汇儴\xa6\x81閺囧瓨鏁奸張\xac\xe8绂岄崠铏规畱閹躲儱鎮曟穱鈩冧紖閿涘矁\xaf\xb7鏉╂稑鍙\x86閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閻ｅ矂娼伴敍宀\x80\xe5仯閸戣\xaf\xb2\xaf\xb9鎼存柨\xad\xa6閺嶁\x80\xb3褰告笟褏娈戦垾婊\x80\xe6叏閺\x80\xe5厜\x80\x9d閹存牑\x80\x9c閸掔娀娅庨垾婵嬫懠閹恒儻绱\xb1\r
  5. 閸婃\xa8\xbf瀚㈤幃銊ユ躬娴ｈ法鏁ゆ潻鍥┾柤娑揬xad\xe6婀侀崶浼存\xaf\xa6閸滃瞼鏋掗梻\xae\xef绱濈拠鐤\xaf\xe4粓缁痋xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn閵哱x82

濞嗐垼绻嬮弶銉ュ煂閺佺増膩缁旂偠绂岀純\x91
妫ｆ牠銆\x89 | 閺備即妞堥崗\xac\xe5鎲\xa1 | 閺圽x80\xe6鏌婃稉瀣\xad\xe6祰 | 閺佺増膩鐠佸搫娼\xa7
閻楀牊娼堥幍\x80\xe6婀\x81 © 娑揬xad\xe5娴楁径褍\xad\xa6閻㈢喐鏆熺\x80\x9b锕\x80\xe7紦濡\xaf\xef紕鐝电挧\x9b\r

vulnerability.name: No DNS wildcard
vulnerability.description: The target site has NO DNS wildcard, and the contents of "http://mcm.edu.cn/" differ from the contents of "http://www2.mcm.edu.cn/".

vulnerability.name: Default virtual host
vulnerability.description: The contents of http://166.111.25.46/ and http://www2.mcm.edu.cn/ differ.

vulnerability.name: Email address disclosure
vulnerability.description: The application discloses the "webmaster@mcm.edu.cn" email address in 1 different HTTP responses. The first ten URLs which sent the email are: - http://www2.mcm.edu.cn/
vulnerability.long-description:
Email addresses are typically found on "Contact us" pages, however, they can also be found within scripts or code comments of the application. They are used to provide a legitimate means of contacting an organisation.
As one of the initial steps in information gathering, cyber-criminals will spider a website and using automated methods collect as many email addresses as possible, that they may then use in a social engineering attack.
Using the same automated methods, the tool was able to detect one or more email addresses that were stored within the affected page.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: E-mail addresses should be presented in such a way that it is hard to process them automatically.

vulnerability.name: Strange HTTP response code
vulnerability.description: The remote web server sent 1 HTTP responses with the uncommon response status code 405 using "Method Not Allowed" as message. The first ten URLs which sent the uncommon status code are: - http://www2.mcm.edu.cn/ibxie
vulnerability.long-description: The server responded with a strange HTTP status code. This is a non-issue however exotic HTTP response status codes can provide useful insights into the behavior of the web application and assist with the information security analysis.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Manually inspect the HTTP response status code and body

http-response.body:
Method Not Allowed

The requested method PUT is not allowed for the URL /ibxie.

vulnerability.name: HTTP traceroute
vulnerability.description: The routes to the target's HTTP and HTTPS ports are the same: 0 192.168.16.2 1 166.111.25.46

http-response.body:
鍏ㄥ浗澶у\xad\xa6鐢熸暟瀛﹀缓妯＄珵璧\x9b
棣栭〉 | 鏂伴椈鍏\xac\xe5憡 | 鏈\x80\xe6柊涓嬭浇 | 鏁版ā璁哄潧
绔欑偣鎼滅储
鐢ㄦ埛鐧诲綍
鐢ㄦ埛鍚\x8d\t
瀵嗙爜
璇\xad\xe8█

璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鏂规硶

  1. 璇风敤璧涘尯绠＄悊鍛樺笎鍙风櫥褰曚俊鎭\xaf\xe7郴缁燂紝鑻ヤ笉鑳芥\xad\xa3甯哥櫥褰曪紝璇疯仈绯\xbb绯荤粺绠＄悊鍛\x98锛\x9b\r
  2. 鐧诲綍鎴愬姛鍚庣偣鍑诲乏渚х殑涓\xaa\xe4汉宸ュ叿绠\xb1锛屽彲淇\xae\xe6敼涓\xaa\xe4汉璧勬枡鍜屽瘑鐮侊紱
  3. 鐐瑰嚮宸︿晶鐨\x84璧涘尯绠＄悊鍗冲彲绠＄悊璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅銆佹彁浜ゆ姤鍚嶆潗鏂欙細
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯淇℃伅锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅缁熻\xae\xa1
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鍚勪釜瀛︽牎鐨勬姤鍚嶆儏鍐\xb5
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 娣诲姞鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛氭坊鍔犳姤鍚嶄俊鎭\xaf
      • 銆\x82\r
    • 閫佸叏鍥借瘎闃呰\xae\xba鏂囩\xae\xa1鐞\x86: 涓婃姤銆佺紪杈戦\x80\x81鍏ㄥ浗璇勯槄鐨勮\xae\xba鏂囦俊鎭\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 鑻ヨ\xa6\x81鏇存敼鏈\xac\xe8禌鍖虹殑鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛岃\xaf\xb7杩涘叆鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌鐣岄潰锛岀偣鍑诲\xaf\xb9搴斿\xad\xa6鏍″彸渚х殑鈥滀慨鏀光\x80\x9d鎴栤\x80\x9c鍒犻櫎鈥濋摼鎺ワ紱
  5. 鍊樿嫢鎮ㄥ湪浣跨敤杩囩▼涓\xad\xe6湁鍥伴毦鍜岀枒闂\xae\xef紝璇疯仈绯\xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn銆\x82

vulnerability.name: Webserver fingerprint
vulnerability.description: The most accurate fingerprint for this HTTP server is: "Apache/2.0.52 (Unix) PHP/5.0.3".

http-response.body:
鍏ㄥ浗澶у\xad\xa6鐢熸暟瀛﹀缓妯＄珵璧\x9b
棣栭〉 | 鏂伴椈鍏\xac\xe5憡 | 鏈\x80\xe6柊涓嬭浇 | 鏁版ā璁哄潧
绔欑偣鎼滅储
鐢ㄦ埛鐧诲綍
鐢ㄦ埛鍚\x8d\t
瀵嗙爜
璇\xad\xe8█

璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鏂规硶

  1. 璇风敤璧涘尯绠＄悊鍛樺笎鍙风櫥褰曚俊鎭\xaf\xe7郴缁燂紝鑻ヤ笉鑳芥\xad\xa3甯哥櫥褰曪紝璇疯仈绯\xbb绯荤粺绠＄悊鍛\x98锛\x9b\r
  2. 鐧诲綍鎴愬姛鍚庣偣鍑诲乏渚х殑涓\xaa\xe4汉宸ュ叿绠\xb1锛屽彲淇\xae\xe6敼涓\xaa\xe4汉璧勬枡鍜屽瘑鐮侊紱
  3. 鐐瑰嚮宸︿晶鐨\x84璧涘尯绠＄悊鍗冲彲绠＄悊璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅銆佹彁浜ゆ姤鍚嶆潗鏂欙細
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯淇℃伅锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鎶ュ悕淇℃伅缁熻\xae\xa1
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌锛氭煡鐪嬫湰璧涘尯鍚勪釜瀛︽牎鐨勬姤鍚嶆儏鍐\xb5
      • 锛\x9b\r
    • 娣诲姞鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛氭坊鍔犳姤鍚嶄俊鎭\xaf
      • 銆\x82\r
    • 閫佸叏鍥借瘎闃呰\xae\xba鏂囩\xae\xa1鐞\x86: 涓婃姤銆佺紪杈戦\x80\x81鍏ㄥ浗璇勯槄鐨勮\xae\xba鏂囦俊鎭\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 鑻ヨ\xa6\x81鏇存敼鏈\xac\xe8禌鍖虹殑鎶ュ悕淇℃伅锛岃\xaf\xb7杩涘叆鏌ョ湅璧涘尯鎶ュ悕鎯呭喌鐣岄潰锛岀偣鍑诲\xaf\xb9搴斿\xad\xa6鏍″彸渚х殑鈥滀慨鏀光\x80\x9d鎴栤\x80\x9c鍒犻櫎鈥濋摼鎺ワ紱
  5. 鍊樿嫢鎮ㄥ湪浣跨敤杩囩▼涓\xad\xe6湁鍥伴毦鍜岀枒闂\xae\xef紝璇疯仈绯\xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn銆\x82

娆㈣繋鏉ュ埌鏁版ā绔炶禌缃\x91
棣栭〉 | 鏂伴椈鍏\xac\xe5憡 | 鏈\x80\xe6柊涓嬭浇 | 鏁版ā璁哄潧
鐗堟潈鎵\x80\xe6湁 © 涓\xad\xe5浗澶у\xad\xa6鐢熸暟瀛﹀缓妯＄珵璧\x9b\r

vulnerability.name: Click-Jacking vulnerability
vulnerability.description: The whole target has no protection (X-Frame-Options header) against Click-Jacking attacks
vulnerability.long-description:
Clickjacking (User Interface redress attack, UI redress attack, UI redressing) is a malicious technique of tricking a Web user into clicking on something different from what the user perceives they are clicking on, thus potentially revealing confidential information or taking control of their computer while clicking on seemingly innocuous web pages.
The server didn't return an `X-Frame-Options` header which means that this website could be at risk of a clickjacking attack. The `X-Frame-Options` HTTP response header can be used to indicate whether or not a browser should be allowed to render a page inside a frame or iframe. Sites can use this to avoid clickjacking attacks, by ensuring that their content is not embedded into other sites.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Configure your web server to include an X-Frame-Options header.

鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳閺傝\xa7\x84纭\xb6\r

  1. 鐠囬\xa3\x8e鏁ょ挧娑樺隘缁狅紕鎮婇崨妯虹瑤閸欓\xa3\x8e娅ヨぐ鏇氫繆閹璡xaf\xe7閮寸紒鐕傜礉閼汇儰绗夐懗鑺\xa5\\xad\xa3鐢\xaf\xe5摜娅ヨぐ鏇\xaa\xe7礉鐠囩柉浠堢化\xbb缁\xaf\xe8崵绮虹粻锛勬倞閸沑x98閿沑x9b\r
  2. 閻ц\xaf\xb2缍嶉幋鎰\xac\xe5\xa7\x9b閸氬海鍋ｉ崙璇蹭箯娓氀呮畱娑揬xaa\xe4姹夊\xae\xb8銉ュ徔缁燶xb1閿涘苯褰叉穱\xae\xe6鏁兼稉\xaa\xe4姹夌挧鍕\xac\xe6灐閸滃苯鐦戦惍渚婄幢
  3. 閻愮懓鍤\xae\xe5\xae\xb8锔挎櫠閻╘x84鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe7粻锛勬倞閸楀啿褰茬粻锛勬倞鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呴妴浣瑰絹娴溿倖濮ら崥宥嗘綏閺傛瑱绱\xb0\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼呯紒鐔籠xae\xa1
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閿涙碍鐓￠惇瀣\xab\xe6拱鐠ф稑灏\xaf\xe9崥鍕\xaa\xe9嚋鐎涳附鐗庨惃鍕\xac\xe5Г閸氬秵鍎忛崘\xb5
      • 閿沑x9b\r
    • 濞ｈ\xaf\xb2濮為幎銉ユ倳娣団剝浼\x85閿涙碍鍧婇崝鐘冲Г閸氬秳淇婇幁\xaf
      • 閵哱x82\r
    • 闁\xab\xe4礁鍙忛崶鍊熺槑闂冨懓\xae\xba閺傚洨\xae\xa1閻瀄x86: 娑撳﹥濮ら妴浣虹椽鏉堟垿\x80\x81閸忋劌娴楃拠鍕\xaf\xe6\xa7\x84閻ㄥ嫯\xae\xba閺傚洣淇婇幁\xaf\xe3\x80\x82
  4. 閼汇儴\xa6\x81閺囧瓨鏁奸張\xac\xe8绂岄崠铏规畱閹躲儱鎮曟穱鈩冧紖閿涘矁\xaf\xb7鏉╂稑鍙\x86閺屻儳婀呯挧娑樺隘閹躲儱鎮曢幆鍛\xad\xe5枌閻ｅ矂娼伴敍宀\x80\xe5仯閸戣\xaf\xb2\xaf\xb9鎼存柨\xad\xa6閺嶁\x80\xb3褰告笟褏娈戦垾婊\x80\xe6叏閺\x80\xe5厜\x80\x9d閹存牑\x80\x9c閸掔娀娅庨垾婵嬫懠閹恒儻绱\xb1\r
  5. 閸婃\xa8\xbf瀚㈤幃銊ユ躬娴ｈ法鏁ゆ潻鍥┾柤娑揬xad\xe6婀侀崶浼存\xaf\xa6閸滃瞼鏋掗梻\xae\xef绱濈拠鐤\xaf\xe4粓缁痋xbb webmaster@mcm.edu.cn閵哱x82
